outputPath.description: The output path of the generated files

tsConfig.description: The path to the Typescript configuration file

themekitConfig.description: The path to the themekit config.yml configuration file

postcssConfig.description: The path to the PostCSS configuration file

poll.description: Frequency of file watcher in ms

outputHashing.description: Define the output filename cache-busting hashing mode.

progress.description: Log progress to the console while building

analyze.description: Analyze the generated bundle and open webpack-bundle-analyzer in the browser

statsJson.description: Generates a 'stats.json' file which can be analyzed using tools such as: #webpack-bundle-analyzer' or https://webpack.github.io/analyse

extractLicenses.description: Extract all licenses in a separate file, in the case of production builds only.

optimization.description: Defines the optimization level of the build.

showCircularDependencies.description: Show circular dependency warnings on builds.

memoryLimit.description: Memory limit for type checking service process in MB.

fileReplacements.description: Replace files with other files in the build.

webpackConfig.description: Path to a function which takes a webpack config, context and returns the resulting webpack config

input.description: The input directory path in which to apply 'glob'. Defaults to the project root.

ignore.description: An array of globs to ignore.
